maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/40/se.orig: The sick tree. Applying \c[3]\v[item.189.name]\c[0] should cure it but it will take time.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/40/se.text: L'arbre malade. Appliquer la \c[3]\v[item.189.name]\c[0] devrait le guérir, mais cela prendra du temps.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/91/se.orig: One of the sick trees. Apply \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] to cure it.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/91/se.text: Un des arbres malades. Appliquez le \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] pour le guérir.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/254/s.orig: We don't like it but we are forced to give you this.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/254/s.text: Nous n'aimons pas cela, mais nous sommes forcés à vous donner ceci.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/254/s.orig: Don't expect a second reward from us.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/254/s.text: N'espérez pas une deuxième récompense de nous.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/262/s.orig:
\i[arrow-ne] Autumn Residences
\i[arrow-w] To Bergen Trail
\i[arrow-e] To Rookie Harbor

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/279/s.text: Cet arbre est un peu bizarre...

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/287/s.text: Formes de vies affamées en approche !

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/287/s.orig: \c[3]Defend the tree for 2 minutes\c[0] for the salve to take effect!
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/287/s.text: \c[3]Défendez l'arbre pendant 2 minutes\c[0] pour que la pommade fasse effet !

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/327/s.orig: Salve lost effect. The sickness returned!
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/327/s.text: La pommade a perdu effet. La maladie est revenue !

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/327/s.orig:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/327/s.text:
\c[1]QUÊTE ÉCHOUÉE\c[0]

Redémarrez la quête pour réessayer.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/329/s.orig: Now this is the entrance to a small and humble \c[3]guild area\c[0].
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/329/s.text: Ici c'est l'entrée d'une modeste petite \c[3]zone de guildes\c[0].

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/329/s.orig: You'll need a pass to enter, so here you go!
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/329/s.text: Vous avez besoin d'un passe pour entrer, donc prenez-le !

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/329/s.orig: This item gives you access to our headquarters as well.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/329/s.text: Cet objet vous donne aussi accès à notre quartier général.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/330/s.orig: The entrance is over there to the \c[3]north\c[0].

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: Lea?
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Lea ?

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: That...\. Lukas...\. he does not remember what happened, correct?
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Ce...\. Lukas...\. Il ne se souvient pas de ce qui s'est passé, c'est ça ?

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: Why?
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: I...\. kind of suspected as much.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Je...\. je le craignais un peu.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: Sorry, I should have talked with you about it.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Désolé, j'aurais dû t'en parler plus tôt.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: That Lukas you met in Vermillion Wasteland...
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Ce Lukas que tu as rencontré à \v[area.arid.name]...

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: He was most likely another \c[3]Evotar\c[0].
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: ... était très probablement aussi un \c[3]Évotar\c[0].

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: In fact...\. I suspect that was the case for all players we saw back there.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: En fait...\. Je crains que ce soit le cas de tous les autres joueurs qu'on ait vu là-bas.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: Do you...\. not want to go back to them?
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Tu ne veux pas... revenir vers eux ?

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: I see.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Je vois.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: This situation is rather...\. complicated.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: C'est une situation...\. compliquée.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: But I am sure they still mean well with you.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Mais je suis sûr qu'ils ne te veulent pas de mal.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: M-Maybe give it a bit of time.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: P-Peut-être qu'il faut juste un peu de temps.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: I am sure you will be able to reconcile eventually.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Je suis sûr que vous finirez par vous réconcilier.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: I suppose...\. we should go to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0] next?
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Peut-être...\. qu'il faut qu'on aille au \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] ensuite ?

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: That is the next major area, north of \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0].
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: C'est la prochaine grosse région, au nord de \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: Our goal is still to reach \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0], correct?
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Notre but est toujours d'atteindre la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0], correct ?

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: I really should try to extend your vocabulary at least a little bit more.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Je devrais vraiment essayer d'étendre ton vocabulaire un peu plus.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: It will be difficult, but I know a few words that might help you in situations like this.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Ça ne sera pas facile, mais je connais quelques mots qui pourront t'aider dans des situations comme ça.

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: I will get on that while you make your way through \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0], alright?
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Je vais m'y mettre pendant que tu frayes ton chemin à travers le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0], ça te va ?

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.orig: Head to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0] (north of \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0]) by yourself.
maps/autumn/path-3-1.json/entities/456/s.text: Dirigez-vous vers le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] (au nord de \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0]) par vous-même.

maps/autumn/path-3-2.json/entities/282/s.orig: Good day Madame. I see you play the lonely class of Spheromancer.
maps/autumn/path-3-2.json/entities/282/s.text: Soyez ravi Madame. Je vois que vous jouez le rôle d'une Spheromanceuse solitaire.

maps/autumn/path-3-2.json/entities/282/s.orig: A view I consider quite rare.
maps/autumn/path-3-2.json/entities/282/s.text: C'est quelque chose, qui, pour moi, arrive très rarement.

maps/autumn/path-3-2.json/entities/282/s.orig: It was a pleasant event to meet you.
maps/autumn/path-3-2.json/entities/282/s.text: C'était une joie de vous rencontrer.

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/117/s.orig: One of the sick trees. Apply \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] to cure it.
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/117/s.text: Un des arbres malades. Appliquez le \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] pour le guérir.

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/288/s.orig: I wonder if they'll ever bring back the fishing system...
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/288/s.text: Je me demande s'ils vont réintégrer le système de pêche dans le jeu.

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.orig: Wow, \v[lore.title.seeker], did you just see what I saw?
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.text: Waouh, \v[lore.title.seeker], tu as vu ce que j'ai vu ?

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.orig: Well, sure, you even fought them.\. \c[3]Flying type\c[0] \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s, that's so rad!
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.text: Bah, qu'est-ce que je raconte, tu les as combattus.\. Des \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s \c[3]Volants\c[0], C'est trop génial !

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.orig: And listen!\. I did some legwork and was able to narrow down the location of their den.
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.text: Et écoute !\. J'ai fait un peu le tour du coin et j'ai réussi à déterminer l'endroit où leur cachette doit se trouver.

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.orig: They actually seem to live in \v[area.autumn-fall.name] and only come to \v[area.autumn-area.name] for apples.
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.text: En fait, ils ont l'air de vivre à \v[area.autumn-fall.name] et ne viennent à \v[area.autumn-area.name] que pour les pommes.

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.orig: Found some of their leavings and those suggested a distaste for the ripe apples of \v[area.autumn-fall.name]!
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.text: J'ai trouvé un peu de leurs restes et ça me laisse penser qu'ils n'apprécient guère les pommes mûres d'\v[area.autumn-fall.name] !

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.orig: Well, it gets results!\. I'm now 99 billion percent sure that they reside on the \c[3]Secluded Path in \v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0].
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.text: Bah, c'est comme ça que j'obtiens des résultats !\. Je suis sûr à mille pourcents qu'ils doivent habiter sur le \c[3]Chemin Isolé à \v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0].

maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.orig: Please hurry and take a look!
maps/autumn/path-3-4.json/entities/359/s.text: Dépêchez-vous et allez-y jeter un coup d'oeil !
